Uses of Interface
org.apache.openjpa.kernel.OpCallbacks

  • Packages that use OpCallbacks 
    Package Description
    org.apache.openjpa.kernel
    OpenJPA Runtime Kernel This package provides a common OpenJPA runtime environment that can be adapted for use with various data store mechanisms.
    org.apache.openjpa.persistence
    OpenJPA JPA This package provides an JPA facade to OpenJPA.
    org.apache.openjpa.slice
    Extended OpenJPA Interfaces for distributed databases.
